text: اذ اوحينا الى امك ما يوحى

translations.translation: when We revealed to your mother:
When We told your mother what We relate:
Recall, when We indicated to your mother through inspiration:
Remember when We inspired your mother with a certain inspiration
“When We inspired in your mother’s heart whatever was to be inspired.”
When We inspired your mother with that which We inspired."
When We revealed to your mother what was revealed;
when We revealed what was revealed unto thy mother:
When we inspired in thy mother that which is inspired,
when We revealed Our will to your mother, saying,
When We inspired unto thy mother that which We inspired,
when We revealed to your mother whatever was to be revealed:
Behold! We sent to thy mother, by inspiration, the message:
When We inspired your mother with that which We inspired.
when We revealed what was to be made known to your mother,
When We inspired your mother with the inspiration.
When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,

[20:38] when (idh, for explanation [of that favour]) We revealed to your mother, either in [her] sleep or by way of inspiration — when she gave birth to you and feared that Pharaoh would have you slain for being one of the newborn [of the Children of Israel] — that which was revealed, regarding your affair (this [mā yūhā, ‘that which was revealed’] is substituted by [what follows, an iqdhifīhi …]),
(When We inspired in thy mother that which is inspired,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وقت { إِذْ أَوْحَيْنَآ } وألهمنا { إِلَىٰ } قلب { أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰ } [طه: 38] وما يُلهم عند نزول البلاء لنجاة الأحياء وخلاصهم عن ورطة الهلاك، وذلك حين إحاطة شَرَطة فرعون المأمورين بقتل أبناء بني إسرائيل على بيت أمك؛ ليقتلوك ظلماً، فاضطربت أمك، وآيست من حياتك
